Reviews.Content: hello coolest advertising design hotel billboard advanced logo neat sun smile mind father suns games child im travel ocean city maryland receive memories look hotel sign anyways book week august runs september sun fun rates hotel motel chains middle august compare price price coming manager truly makes stay retail world care customer service consumer eric goes beyond satisfy patrons requested service friendly truly cares people staying resort people todays world unapproachable eric nice people communicating help easily decide book location ocean city maryland experience seeing familiar accessible throughout day night hotel motel chains sun fun motel location blocks beginning boardwalk located near subs front motel family friends stay location rates location motel manager thanks sun fun vacation blast definitely continue staying service top quality truly believe thats based sincere true personality ethic truly makes stay beyond ton able book customer service bump rest

Reviews.Title: “utterly disgusting”
Reviews.Author: Kerri M
Reviews.Content: motel worst stayed walking noticed crushed pretzels pieces cereal hair floor didnt pretend vacuum drawers found candy wrappers inside box spring cover huge red stain literally spilled juice box changed sheets brown stains sand beds requested sheets sheets changed found toenail bed sheets changed bathroom yellow urine stain toilet vanity hair tub black whenever showered walked bathroom wore flipflops towels brownish red stains looked blood truly picked towels floor refolded frankly cheap found ocean city maryland cheap fun sun isnt cheap literally dont pretend clean trouble sleeping creeped didnt help dirty pillow spot bed beg stay dont continue business
